description: Sorting data for a specific animal on a location.

animalId.description: Unique animal scheme and identifier combination.

siteId.description: Unique identifier in the system for this site.

validFrom.description: Specifies from when the sort command should be active. RFC3339 UTC date time (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

validTo.description: Specifies until when the sort command should be active. Could be left empty, when the sorting should be permanent. RFC3339 UTC date time (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).
